code: import React from"react";import contentData from"../content.json";import{FaGithub,FaLinkedin,FaHandshake}from"react-icons/fa";import{MdEmail}from"react-icons/md";import{Fade}from"react-awesome-reveal";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Linkbar=function Linkbar(){var general=contentData.general;var socialLinks=[{icon:MdEmail,href:general.navbar_social_links.email,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer"},{icon:FaHandshake,href:general.navbar_social_links.handshake,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer"},{icon:FaLinkedin,href:general.navbar_social_links.linkedin,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer"},{icon:FaGithub,href:general.navbar_social_links.github,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"linkbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:socialLinks.map(function(link,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{delay:index*200,triggerOnce:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:link.href,target:link.target,rel:link.rel,className:"social-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(link.icon,{})})})},index);})})});};export default Linkbar;
